paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Six patients were classified as ATTRv-CM patients (3 male, 3 female, mean age 67.7 ± 5.8 years).
14 as ATTRv-PN patients (12 male, 2 female, mean age 62.9 ± 3.1 years).
5 presymptomatic carriers (2 male, 3 female, mean age 40.4 ± 2.8 years).

functional_data.summary: CCM identifies small nerve fibre damage in presymptomatic carriers and symptomatic patients.

variants.additional_notes: The study highlights the genetic heterogeneity and clinical variability of TTR mutations.
key_quotes: To date, more than 120 amyloidogenic mutations of the TTR gene have been identified.
Age at disease onset ranges from 20 to 80 years, and penetrance is incomplete.

tables_processed.table_caption: Characteristics of patients with ATTRv amyloidosis and presymptomatic carriers

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for the TTR gene was extracted successfully.
